---
layout:         post-mbed-org
title:          "mbed fest 2012"
date:           2012-02-02T09:55:53.000Z
author:         Amit Naran
tags:           2012, fest, Japan
originalUrl:    https://developer.mbed.org/blog/entry/mbed-fest-2012/
---

<p>
  <a href=
  "http://jksoft.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/2011/12/mbed-0d48.html"
  rel="nofollow"><strong>mbed fest 2012</strong></a> was held on
  the 29th January 2012 at Akihabara Network and Embedded
  Technology Centre in Japan.
</p>
<table>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <img src=
      "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbed__2012_original.png"
      alt="/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbed__2012_original.png"
      title=
      "/media/uploads/anaran/_scaled_mbed__2012_original.png">
    </td>
    <td>
      <div class="flex-video">
        <iframe width="420" height="315" src=
        "https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZLZvPu085aw" frameborder="0"
        allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
      </div>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
<p>
  <span><span class="authortext"><a href="/users/okano/"><img alt=
  "" class="icon" src=
  "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
  <a href="/users/okano/">Tedd OKANO</a></span></span> attended the
  event and has shared great write up of the day:
</p>
<div class="flashbox fquote">
  <h4 class="ftitle">
    <span class="authortext"><a href="/users/okano/"><img alt=""
    class="icon" src=
    "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
    <a href="/users/okano/">Tedd OKANO</a></span> wrote:
  </h4>
  <p>
    This was second mbed user meeting held in Japan after the
    initial mbed fest in <a href=
    "http://mbed.org/users/nxpfan/notebook/report-mbed-fest2010-1st-user-meeting-in-tokyo-02-/">
    October 2010</a>.<br>
    <br>
    There were 21 attendees and 5 presenters and it was very nice
    user meeting and exciting experience for all. We also arranged
    a live stream the event, allowing others to remotely enjoy the
    meeting as well.<br>
    <br>
    The user meeting began with a video message from the mbed team
    in the UK. It was great to find out what is going on with
    mbed.org, and we expect a lot in future!<br>
    <br>
    There were six presentations
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li>NXP : “What is mbed?”
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/mark2r2/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/mark2r2/">eichi kowata</a></span></span> :
      “<a href="/users/mark2r2/programs/geiger/lxt2nd">Geiger
      Counter Kit</a> and its prototype board”
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/techand/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/techand/">Shinji Tadenuma</a></span></span> :
      <a href=
      "/users/techand/notebook/blackone-new-boad-with-xbee-graphiclcd/">
      “BlackOne”</a> an all-in-one mbed/LPCXpresso baseboard
    </li>
    <li>A. Saito : Cortex-M0, iOS – example of an Arduino-API
    implemented on an M0 board working with a smart-phone
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/Studio_NAND/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/Studio_NAND/">Dairyo Gokan</a></span></span>
      : “NANDethno Pocket mbed” a base board for mbed
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/jksoft913/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/jksoft913/">Junichi
      Katsu</a></span></span>(who hosted this event) : “mbed and I”
    </li>
  </ul>
  <table>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_present.jpg.pagespeed.ic.sAU7llMqu1.jpg">
      </td>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_present1.jpg.pagespeed.ic.WZlPgPBMWq.jpg">
      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <p>
    Additionally, three people presented their projects in
    lightning-talk sessions
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/y_notsu/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/y_notsu/">Yuji Notsu</a></span></span>:
      <a href="/users/y_notsu/notebook/mbed-geigersystem/">Geiger
      Counter</a> project and measurement results
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/kentasaito/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/kentasaito/">Kenta Saito</a></span></span>:
      mbed <a href=
      "/users/kentasaito/notebook/what-is-flageoboard/">Sound
      Synthesizer</a>
    </li>
    <li>
      <span><span class="authortext"><a href=
      "/users/junTMUG/"><img alt="" class="icon" src=
      "data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a>
      <a href="/users/junTMUG/">Junichi Nagayama</a></span></span>:
      Timeline printer using mbed (automatic printing of tweets
      with specified hash tag)
    </li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    A beginners hands-on session was also done. Five people
    experienced how easy it is to start development and make a
    prototype quickly.
  </p>
  <table>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_training.jpg.pagespeed.ic.NCaLzdWSHM.jpg">
      </td>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_demos.jpg.pagespeed.ic.U6Anshcx9F.jpg">
      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <p>
    At the end of the user meeting – we held a lottery. Many prizes
    were given out including, 5 blue mbeds, 5 yellow mbeds, base
    boards, custom made M0 boards with LPCXpresso, RJ45 connectors
    with cables and a book of mbed primers. All prizes we’re kindly
    are provided from mbed team, NXP, and presenters.
  </p>
  <table>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_lottery.jpg.pagespeed.ic.s3ZO9AFmuj.jpg">
      </td>
      <td>
        <img width="350" alt="600" title="600" src=
        "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_party.jpg.pagespeed.ic.nHCTngGfON.jpg">
      </td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <p>
    After the meeting, we had a gathering (beer) party. Time flies
    so quickly.
  </p>
  <p>
    I hope to have next meeting soon.
  </p>
</div>
<p>
  Thanks Okano-san for a great write-up and Mr. Junichi Katsu for
  sponsoring mbed fest 2012!
</p>
<p>
  To see more, you can find recorded footage of the event online -
  <a href="http://www.ustream.tv/recorded/20105894" rel=
  "nofollow">Part1</a> and <a href=
  "http://www.ustream.tv/recorded/20107732" rel=

  "https://plus.google.com/photos/117006462131012739000/albums/5703266678669439249?authkey=CJfMqNvvoqDb-AE"
  rel="nofollow">image gallery</a>
</p>
